author: hship
msg: Change names of Pool methods slightly.
Add a bunch of log4j logging to Script, ScriptGenerator, RequestCycle, etc.
Use better names for some IRequestCycle attributes (used to track active components).

author: hship
msg: Fix the configure-jboss rule to depend on setup-jbe-util (not -utils).

author: hship
msg: Slight touch up, adding tool option variables which will make porting to
non-GNU environments (like Solaris) a bit easier.
